author: Upper Echelon
description:
Go to https://surfshark.com/echelon or use code ECHELON at checkout to get 4 extra months of Surfshark VPN!

After an incredible meltdown by Grok (Elon Musk's AI Large Language Model), and the resignation of Twitter CEO Linda Yaccarino, the "MechaHitler Incident" of 2025, perfectly showcases a hypocritical, headlong rush to create things that can go wildly off the rails with one simple line of text. 

If the surrounding context of a meltdown like this is the AI self identifying as Musk himself, while heavily drawing from his personal tweets and opinions to form its own... how then should we evaluate the famous hand motion he made during a speech at the inauguration of Donald Trump. Does his heart simply "go out to his fans"? or is it something more.
